actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to promote the domestic recruiting of teachers for teaching positions in overseas dependents' schools of the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Defense Department Overseas Teachers Act - Amends the Defense Department Overseas Teachers Pay and Personnel Practices Act regarding Department of Defense overseas dependents schools to limit the term of teaching positions and the travel and quarters allowance benefits for teachers who are recruited outside the United States.

titles.title: A bill to promote the domestic recruiting of teachers for teaching positions in overseas dependents' schools of the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.
